title: Countries with the highest inflation rate 2019
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Inflation rate compared to previous year in the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Venezuela and lowest at Country Mongolia.
The highest Country Venezuela has 199990.97 more Inflation rate compared to previous year than the lowest Country Mongolia.
min_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Venezuela and lowest at Country Mongolia.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Inflation rate compared to previous year in the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is highest at Country Venezuela and lowest at Country Mongolia.
The highest Country Venezuela has 199990.97 more Inflation rate compared to previous year than the lowest Country Mongolia.
max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Inflation rate compared to previous year in each Country on the y axis.
The Inflation rate compared to previous year is appeared to be the highest at Country Venezuela and lowest at Country Mongolia.
The difference of Inflation rate compared to previous year between the highest and lowest Country is 199990.97.
Country Venezuela is higher than any other Countrys with value 200000.0, followed by Zimbabwe, and Argentina. Down to Country Mongolia with the lowest value 9.03.
The lowest value 9.03 at Mongolia is almost 19.95 times smaller than the average value 10026.31.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 200526.12.
